node.title: Video appears to show Mike Tyson punching passenger on JetBlue plane
node.description: Representatives for the former boxer said another passenger was being aggressive, which started the incident.
node.content: ["Former professional boxer Mike Tyson allegedly punched a fellow passenger on a JetBlue flight. Video taken on a cell phone and obtained by TMZ shows the former heavyweight champion throwing several punches aimed behind his seat.\u00a0", "Representatives for Tyson said that the other passenger started the incident.\u00a0", "\"Unfortunately, Mr. Tyson had an incident on a flight with an aggressive passenger who began harassing him and threw a water bottle at him while he was in his seat,\" Tyson's representatives said in a statement Thursday.\u00a0", "JetBlue did not immediately respond to CBS News' request for comment."]
